channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump’s law enforcement surge is alienating DC residents, senior officers say
item.description: A pair of senior Washington, D.C., police commanders acknowledged that the ongoing federal law enforcement surge in the nation’s capital is alienating the population and damaging community relationships.

item.title: Spate of hoax calls about active shooters stir fear at college campuses around the US
Kilmar Abrego Garcia is back in jail and facing deportation. Here’s what to know
